name: Put it on, skeleton
description:
Put it on, skeleton! is a dress-up game about a skeleton looking for a job. Dress up to a job interview, gain the sympathy of most of your interviewers, and get that job offer! Features:
  • Get dressed for the weather: lifeless desert heat, gloomy wasteland chill, or treacherous mountain frost
  • Fit the company culture: your interviewers can be werewolves, merfolk, vampires, and ghosts
  • Dress to impress: please as many interviewers as you can with your unique and stylish look
